Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_02.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_03.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_04.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_051.Text: *: I have heard that there are several spots in this world where one can grow in strength in a speedy fashion.
*: Alas, they cannot be reached on foot, which is why few even know of their existence.
*: I must admit, I myself am purrfectly purrplexed as to how they actually make one stronger, never mind how they achieve this in a manner most quick...

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Front_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: You stand in the Castle of the Dragon Queen<--->the closest place in this world to the heavens.
*: You stand in the Castle of the Dragon Queen<--->the closest place in this world to the heavens.
*: This land may be the Dragon Queen's domain, but set foot outside the castle walls and you will be faced with your fair share of fiends.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text:
*: The end is nigh...
Precious little of the queen's life remains...

*: The queen is dead...
May her immortal soul reside forevermore with the Goddess!

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Our queen has long awaited the day when one who could banish the darkness would make themselves known. It is hard to fathom that said day is finally upon us...
*: The queen has at last given the gift of life to her child. It is such a joyous occasion and yet...I... (sob)

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: She is not long for this world and yet the queen continues to carry out her duty with all her being...
*: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
*: Don't worry, we'll look after the egg! It's safe with us!

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410.Text: *: Remember that life goes on even after death. We need not mourn, though our hearts may tell us otherwise.
*: Now, we need but wait. When the time is right, we will witness the birth and beginning of an entirely new life.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510.Text: *: The Dragon Queen's era may have come to an end.
*: However, her offspring will take her place and guide us as she so graciously did.
*: It falls to us, her humble servants, to protect the egg till it is ready to hatch.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610.Text: *: It is through the continuous cycle of rebirth that the dragon most holy has watched over this realm.
*: Maintain your faith and the future shall be one of hope and peace.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710.Text: Your Majesty... I know that I am not worthy, but I beg you to forgive me...
Forgive me for being powerless to prevent this most untimely of ends...
The burden was surely too great even for thee. The strain of watching over two realms torn asunder...
Were the world as it ought to be, thou wouldst surely yet live.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810.Text: *: We have been expecting you. Welcome to the Castle of the Dragon Queen.
*: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_back_SUB_0_ACTOR_01.Text: *: This castle is the closest place to heaven in the whole world!
*: Apparently, if you earn the title of a true hero, you can even get there from here!
*: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
*: No way! You went to heaven, didn't you? Ohhh, I'm so jealous!

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Queen_room_MAIN_0_S.Text: You stand before the Dragon Queen<--->servant of the almighty Goddess.
Thank you for heeding my call and making your way here.
Doubtless one of my retainers has already told you, but I have scant time left.
Listen well, child of Ortega.
For I am about to impart all that I know of Zoma whilst my life's flame yet burns.
I do so in the hope that it will allow you to vanquish the fiend and restore order to our realm. Will you heed my request?
Thank you sincerely...
Ah, you had planned to challenge Zoma even before our meeting today? I would expect no less of Ortega's child.
Zoma dwells in the depths of the Underworld. Start your journey there by first heading east of Baramos's lair.
Eventually you will come across an island in the middle of a lake. Its caves will lead you to the world below.
Now, do not weep for me. My time is simply coming to an end, and I am certain my offspring can handle the task that awaits.
Just know that Zoma possesses a power unlike any you have faced thus far. You would underestimate him at your peril.
However, as long as you have this, you will not falter. The light will return... Of that I am sure...
{HERO} acquires the Sphere of Light!
When faced with forces most dark, hold that sphere aloft. Then it will be your turn to prove your might once more.
Your Majesty!
Now it falls to me to pass on the torch to my dearest child...
Having entrusted the Sphere of Light to {HERO}, the Dragon Queen, with her last breath, lays an egg containing her offspring.
Those who served the queen gather to mourn her passing.
Then, a short while later...
Words fail me... Had I the strength, thy light may yet shine bright...
Why, {HERO}, your travels appear to have taken their toll. Allow me to restore you to health, that you might continue your adventure.

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Queen_room_SUB_0_AC.Text: The soft sounds of sleep float forth from within...

Txt_Talk_DragonQueen_Queen_room_MAIN_0_S.Text: Your Majesty...
Fear not for I will see that thine offspring grows into a fine leader of the land.
I promise, nay, I swear upon my name...
The name of...
...Hargon.
To be continued in...
